title: mri_compute_overlap
description: Computes three different types of overlap measures for labels in input volumes.

volumes.title: Input volumes
volumes.description: Input volume files for which overlap measures are computed.

label_numbers.title: Label numbers
label_numbers.description: List of specific label numbers for which to compute overlap measures. If not specified, all labels are considered if -a is provided.

total_overlap.title: Total overlap flag
total_overlap.description: Compute the total overlap, which is the number of voxels that are the same among all labels.

no_summary.title: No summary flag
no_summary.description: Do not compute total label summary.

mask.title: Mask volume
mask.description: Limit the domain of the calculation to the nonzero voxels in specified volume.

quiet_mode.title: Quiet mode flag
quiet_mode.description: Do not display results on standard display. If -l is specified, this flag is automatically set.

translate_label.title: Translate label
translate_label.description: Translate label l1 to label l2.
